caseName: V1-16XC activation fail during provisioning ONT model 2466GN

allProps.Case Name: V1-16XC activation fail during provisioning ONT model 2466GN

resumen:
Se presento falla durante activaci贸n de 2466GN en v1-16xc, se tenian potencias de ONT en rango  pero la OLT generaba ACTIVATION FAIL  , durante el incidencia se cambio patchchord pero falla continu贸 , la ONT estaba en buen estado pues se habia probado en almacen,
para intentar solucionar tambi茅n se reinicio la OLT , se cambi贸 OLT por otra del mismo modelo y falla continu贸 , en 煤ltimo estatus de zhone nos dijeron que estaba pendiente liberar un nuevo firmware para corregir  problema
notas:
Comment/Solution Text
Hello Rogeiro,

I am sharing the requested information.



> Have you ever tested the 2466GN on a V1-16XC before?

Yes Sr, we usually install the model 2466GN for our clients with internet services in this OLT V1-16XC but lately we have found that sometimes the OLT is rejecting the activation , We are investigating the reason for this unexpected behavior.



>What is the current sw load you are running on this 2466GN ?



(D)(R) S7.0.081 



>Can you also please send the full show running-config on this OLT?



I attached the running-config requested





Comment/Solution Text
Would you agree to upgrade the ONU to latest GA load S7.0.100 and see if it improves the results?

I am not sure yet why we are having this problem, but we know that version you are currently using has a bug that some times causes memory issues on ONU and make it less responsive or even stop working. I wonder if improving the memory usage it will respond better.

Here is the link for the new GA in case you do accept to test:

ftp:fpt.zhone.com/outgoing/_1week/FIBERX/

user anonymous pass anonymous


Comment/Solution Text
Hi Rogerio,

I downloaded the firmware 0700100 and applied it to a ONT 2466GN in our LAB, which is connected to our LAB OLT v1-16xc, I'm getting same ACTIVATION FAIL events in the Log, I can provide you with remote access if you want to check the problem in our lab OLT.



image.png


Comment/Solution Text
Sorry Jose Luis, but I couldnt make it today. I will be available next Monday early in the morning.

Can you please enable the debug gpon log and try the ONT again?

enabled

configure terminal

console enable

debug gpon omci console



Lets see if there is more info ther
detalleDelProblema:
Se presento falla durante activaci贸n de 2466GN en v1-16xc, se tenian potencias de ONT en rango  pero la OLT generaba ACTIVATION FAIL  , durante el incidencia se cambio patchchord pero falla continu贸 , la ONT estaba en buen estado pues se habia probado en almacen,
para intentar solucionar tambi茅n se reinicio la OLT , se cambi贸 OLT por otra del mismo modelo y falla continu贸 , en 煤ltimo estatus de zhone nos dijeron que estaba pendiente liberar un nuevo firmware para corregir  problema
resolucion: Caso en gesti贸n por parte de zhone

caseName: ONU 5302 provisioned in V1-16XC xgspon port with sfp+ module XGS-GP-COMBO-SFP+ Hisense LTF5308B-BHB+ doesn't pass packets with MTU greater than 1500

allProps.Case Name: ONU 5302 provisioned in V1-16XC xgspon port with sfp+ module XGS-GP-COMBO-SFP+ Hisense LTF5308B-BHB+ doesn't pass packets with MTU greater than 1500

resumen: Debido a reporte de un cliente se detecto que ONU 5302 no estaba pasando MTU superior a 1500
detalleDelProblema: Debido a reporte de un cliente se detecto que ONU 5302 no estaba pasando MTU superior a 1500  en V1-16XC xgspon con m贸dulo sfp+ XGS-GP-COMBO-SFP+ Hisense LTF5308B-BHB+ no transmite paquetes con MTU superior a 1500.
resolucion: Se determino que habia un problema con el m贸dulo LTF5308B-BHB+  instalado en el puerto XGSPON de la OLT el cual se cambi贸 por  modelo HISENSE LTF5308B-BCA+)
